SEARCH
Package container

Class WithdrawalList

java.lang.Object
container.WithdrawalList
public class WithdrawalList extends Object
Represents a container for withdrawal requests in the BTO system.

Handles loading from and saving to CSV, as well as logic for filtering and managing withdrawal entries tied to specific applicants or projects.

  • Constructor Summary

      Displays all withdrawals associated with the given applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant whose withdrawals are to be viewed

    • getPendingWithdrawalsByProject

      public ArrayList<Withdrawal> getPendingWithdrawalsByProject(Project project)
      Gets all pending withdrawal requests for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to filter by
      Returns:
      list of withdrawals with status PENDING

    • saveToCSV

      public void saveToCSV()
      Saves all withdrawals to a CSV file. Each entry contains applicant NRIC, project name, and status.
